verses.verse: Now those that sealed <WH2856> <WH8803> were, Nechemyah <WH5166>, the Tirshatha <WH8660>, the son <WH1121> of Hachaliah <WH2446>, and ZidkiYAH <WH6667>,
Maaziah <WH4590>, Bilgai <WH1084>, Shemaiah <WH8098>: these were the Kohanim <WH3548>.
And the L'vi'im <WH3881>: both Jeshua <WH3442> the son <WH1121> of Azaniah <WH245>, Binnui <WH1131> of the sons <WH1121> of Henadad <WH2582>, Kadmiel <WH6934>;
And their brethren <WH251>, SH'vaniah <WH7645>, HodiYAH <WH1941>, Kelita <WH7042>, Pelaiah <WH6411>, Hanan <WH2605>,
The chief <WH7218> of the people <WH5971>; Parosh <WH6551>, Pahathmoab <WH6355>, Elam <WH5867>, Zatthu <WH2240>, Bani <WH1137>,

And the rest <WH7605> of the people <WH5971>, the Kohanim <WH3548>, the L'vi'im <WH3881>, the porters <WH7778>, the singers <WH7891> <WH8789>, the Nethinims <WH5411>, and all they that had separated <WH914> <WH8737> themselves from the people <WH5971> of the lands <WH776> unto the Torah <WH8451> of 'Elohim <WH430>, their wives <WH802>, their sons <WH1121>, and their daughters <WH1323>, every one having knowledge <WH3045> <WH8802>, and having understanding <WH995> <WH8688>;

They clave <WH2388> <WH8688> to their brethren <WH251>, their nobles <WH117>, and entered <WH935> <WH8802> into a curse <WH423>, and into an oath <WH7621>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in 'Elohim's <WH430> Torah <WH8451>, which was given <WH5414> <WH8738> by <WH3027> Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and to observe <WH8104> <WH8800> and do <WH6213> <WH8800> all the Mitzvot <WH4687> of the YY <WH3068> our YY <WH113>, and his judgments <WH4941> and his statutes <WH2706>;
And that we would not give <WH5414> <WH8799> our daughters <WH1323> unto the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, nor take <WH3947> <WH8799> their daughters <WH1323> for our sons <WH1121>:

And if the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> bring <WH935> <WH8688> ware <WH4728> or any victuals <WH7668> on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117> to sell <WH4376> <WH8800>, that we would not buy <WH3947> <WH8799> it of them on the sabbath <WH7676>, or on the holy <WH6944> day <WH3117>: and that we would leave <WH5203> <WH8799> the seventh <WH7637> year <WH8141>, and the exaction <WH4853> of every debt <WH3027>.

Also we made <WH5975> <WH8689> ordinances <WH4687> for us, to charge <WH5414> <WH8800> ourselves yearly <WH8141> with the third part <WH7992> of a shekel <WH8255> for the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>;

For the shewbread <WH4635> <WH3899>, and for the continual <WH8548> meat offering <WH4503>, and for the continual <WH8548> burnt offering <WH5930>, of the sabbaths <WH7676>, of the new moons <WH2320>, for the set feasts <WH4150>, and for the holy <WH6944> things, and for the sin offerings <WH2403> to make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8763> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and for all the work <WH4399> of the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.

And we cast <WH5307> <WH8689> the lots <WH1486> among the Kohanim <WH3548>, the L'vi'im <WH3881>, and the people <WH5971>, for the wood <WH6086> offering <WH7133>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> it into the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, after the houses <WH1004> of our fathers <WH1>, at times <WH6256> appointed <WH2163> <WH8794> year <WH8141> by year <WH8141>, to burn <WH1197> <WH8763> upon the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, as it is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the Torah <WH8451>:

And to bring <WH935> <WH8687> the firstfruits <WH1061> of our ground <WH127>, and the firstfruits <WH1061> of all fruit <WH6529> of all trees <WH6086>, year <WH8141> by year <WH8141>, unto the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>:

Also the firstborn <WH1060> of our sons <WH1121>, and of our cattle <WH929>, as it is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the Torah <WH8451>, and the firstlings <WH1062> of our herds <WH1241> and of our flocks <WH6629>, to bring <WH935> <WH8687> to the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, unto the Kohanim <WH3548> that minister <WH8334> <WH8764> in the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>:

And that we should bring <WH935> <WH8686> the firstfruits <WH7225> of our dough <WH6182>, and our offerings <WH8641>, and the fruit <WH6529> of all manner of trees <WH6086>, of wine <WH8492> and of oil <WH3323>, unto the Kohanim <WH3548>, to the chambers <WH3957> of the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>; and the tithes <WH4643> of our ground <WH127> unto the L'vi'im <WH3881>, that the same L'vi'im <WH3881> might have the tithes <WH6237> <WH8764> in all the cities <WH5892> of our tillage <WH5656>.

And the Kohen <WH3548> the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> shall be with the L'vi'im <WH3881>, when the L'vi'im <WH3881> take tithes <WH6237> <WH8687>: and the L'vi'im <WH3881> shall bring up <WH5927> <WH8686> the tithe <WH4643> of the tithes <WH4643> unto the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>, to the chambers <WH3957>, into the treasure <WH214> house <WH1004>.

For the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> shall bring <WH935> <WH8686> the offering <WH8641> of the corn <WH1715>, of the new wine <WH8492>, and the oil <WH3323>, unto the chambers <WH3957>, where are the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH4720>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> that minister <WH8334> <WH8764>, and the porters <WH7778>, and the singers <WH7891> <WH8789>: and we will not forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> the house <WH1004> of our 'Elohim <WH430>.
